description: PG&E billing email should be filtered out

input.subject: Your PG&E Bill Statement - a subsidiary of PG&E Corporation
input.plaintext: Your monthly utility bill is ready for review. Please log in to your account to view your statement.

description: FocusKPI application with position in subject

input.subject: Application Received - We've Received Your Application For Sales Analyst
input.plaintext: Thank you for your interest in FocusKPI Inc. We have received your application for the Sales Analyst position and will review it shortly.

description: Lucid Motors thank you email with position

input.subject: Thank You For Applying To The Data Engineer Position
input.plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

Thank you for your interest in Lucid Motors. We have received your application for the Data Engineer position and will be in touch soon.

Best regards,
Lucid Motors Talent Team

input.subject: Extend. Your application has been received for Software Engineer
input.plaintext: Thank you for applying to Extend. Your application has been received and our team will review it shortly. We appreciate your interest in joining our team.

input.subject: Application Received - Gap Inc Retail Associate Position
input.plaintext: Thank you for applying to Gap Inc through our Workday system. Your application has been received and is being reviewed by our hiring team.

description: Workday email from Centene with reporting position

input.subject: Your Application: Workday Reporting Data Analyst at Centene
input.plaintext:
Dear Applicant,

Thank you for your application to the Workday Reporting Data Analyst position at Centene Corporation. We will review your qualifications and contact you if selected for an interview.

input.subject: Application Update - Software Engineer Role
input.plaintext:
Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in the Software Engineer role at Persona. We have received your application and our team is currently reviewing all submissions.

Best,
Persona Talent Team

input.subject: Interview Invitation - Technical Screen for Backend Developer
input.plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

We would like to invite you for a technical screen interview for the Backend Developer position at TechCorp. Please let us know your availability.

description: Rejection email should override status to Declined

input.subject: Update on your application - Unfortunately, we will not proceed
input.plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

Thank you for your interest in the Product Manager role. Unfortunately, we have decided not to move forward with your application at this time.

description: Offer email should override status to Offer

input.subject: Congratulations! Offer for Senior Data Scientist Position
input.plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

We are pleased to offer you the Senior Data Scientist position at DataCorp. Please find the offer details attached.
